Title: Jodhpur Pocket Square From Chokore Arte Collection
Description:
This pocket square is more than just a piece of fabric; it's a love letter to the city of Jodhpur, with its rich heritage and its towering monuments of bravery. And the Chokore Arte Collection adds a touch of art and technology to the mix, creating a unique masterpiece that symbolizes the perfect fusion of culture and creativity. The strokes of Van Gogh and the details of da Vinci come to life on the silken canvas, a harmonious blend of tradition and technology. This pocket square is not only a pioneer in the Indian fashion world, but it is also a tribute to the great Masters and their timeless works. Created with love and respect for the artists, let this elegant accessory be a constant reminder of the magic of art and the limitless possibilities of technology and a symbol of the city of Jodhpur, a place where the sky meets the desert and the blue city takes your breath away.
The pocket square has been developed using generative AI, through a blend of Stable Diffusion, DALL.E2, Coherent (Clip Guided Diffusion) and Artistic (VQGAN + Clip).

100% Silk.

Suitable for formalwear and ethnicwear

"Introducing “Closer” - an evening fragrance that invites you into the alluring embrace of the night. With meticulous notes, this perfume captures the enchantment of twilight and indulges your senses with a musky and floral experience.

Title: Simla Pocket Square From Chokore Arte Collection
Description:
Where the beauty of the mountains soars and the air is pure and bright, Shimla holds a treasure of nature's might, a tranquil escape for those in flight. This pocket square is a symbol of art and love, a representation of all that is pure and above. And the Chokore Arte Collection takes this to new heights, combining culture and creativity with timeless delights. The brushstrokes of Van Gogh and the delicate details of da Vinci, now come to life on silken canvas, a true masterpiece, magnificent and pretty. This pocket square is a pioneer, a true innovator in the Indian fashion sphere, showcasing the perfect harmony of art and technology, so dear. Created with reverence for the artists of old, it is a shining emblem of a city that never grows old, where nature's grandeur reigns supreme, a place that shines like a precious gem.
The pocket square has been developed using generative AI, through a blend of Stable Diffusion, DALL.E2, Coherent (Clip Guided Diffusion) and Artistic (VQGAN + Clip).

100% Silk.
